title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 215: Ft Tim Stapleton
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by one of their funniest guests yet, Tim Stapleton. Tim joins to talk about his time in Russia, playing for Mike Keenan, his new company and a ton more. The boys also touch on some NHL news including the red hot Canucks and Islanders. The boys wrap up with Gambling Corner from Rear Admiral who has appeared to have turned things around


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
